name: Perfect Day Planner
description: Not satisfied how you're spending your days? I know the feeling. Here's what I see as the fundamental problem. You haven't defined what your perfect day looks like. You're not planning your days with that ideal schedule in front of your eyes. Perfect Day Planner is Notion template designed to fix this problem by keeping your ideal day at the forefront of your daily planning. It ensures your vision guides your actual schedule.So why not grab a copy and start moving toward your ideal lifestyle one
features: You haven't defined what your perfect day looks like.; You're not planning your days with that ideal schedule in front of your eyes.
